actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Dairy, Nutrition, and Forestry

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture should investigate and find alternative actions with regard to the unilateral temporary termination of the participation of retail food stores in the electronic benefits transfer system (EBT) under the Food Stamp Act of 1977.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture, through the Food and Nutrition Service, should find alternative actions with regard to the unilateral temporary termination of the participation of retail food stores in the electronic benefits transfer system (EBT) under the Food Stamp Act of 1977.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture should investigate and find alternative actions with regard to the unilateral temporary termination of the participation of retail food stores in the electronic benefits transfer system (EBT) under the Food Stamp Act of 1977.
